subject: Order Update SSN1851 & SSN1847
description_text:
Hello there,

I am reaching out in regards to an update on my orders as last I checked for updates only the tracking number has been provided with no indication that it has been picked up or out in shipment. Please let me know if any additional information is needed.

Best Regards,

Justin Zetterlund

conversations.body_text:
Hi there,

I never heard back from this email. Is there any updates? It has now been almost a month.

>

Hi Justin Zetterlund,  I'm very sorry, we really didn't check the logistic update, we will investigate it for you immediately and if there is an accident we will part you immediately and upgrade you a Vam Pro haptics for free.

Hello there,

Thank you again for the update. Let know if anything has changed.

Best regards,

Justin


>
Hi Justin Zetterlund,  Your package has been shipped and we have replaced it with a Vam Pro for you.

Hello there,

Thank you again for the update and the upgrade. I wanted to ask are both orders shipped out as I only got a tracking number for one order.

Thanks again,

Justin 

>
Yes, they were sent in the same package, please don't worry.
